mapper.select: select opi.pay_no, opi.ord_no, opi.pay_mn_cd, opi.pay_prgs_scd, opi.rfnd_avl_amt, opi.pay_amt, opi.trsn_id, opi.pay_cmt_dtime, opi.vr_acct, opi.vr_acct_nm, opi.vr_bnk_cd, opi.vr_val_dt, opi.vr_val_tt, ogi.goods_nm, oob.ord_nm from op_pay_info opi inner join op_goods_info ogi using (ord_no) inner join op_ord_base oob using (ord_no) where opi.ord_no = #{ordNo} and opi.pay_prgs_scd in ('10', '20') order by opi.sys_reg_dtime desc limit 1
